channel.title: Please help! Will rep
channel.description:
Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 9510 at net.com.codeusa.world.clipInfo.checkPos(clipInfo.java:15) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.update.NPCMovement.getNextNPCMovement(NPCMovemen t.java:57) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.combat.NpcCombat.appendPlayerFollowing(NpcCombat .java:1913) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.NPC.process(NPC.java:490) at net.com.codeusa.Engine.run(Engine.java:255) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 at net.com.codeusa.model.combat.PlayerCombat.getRangeDamageDelay(PlayerC ombat.java:2221) at net.com.codeusa.model.combat.PlayerCombat.attackNpc(PlayerCombat.java :232) at net.com.codeusa.model.Player.process(Player.java:2003) at net.com.codeusa.Engine.run(Engine.java:227) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
xception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 5723 at net.com.codeusa.world.clipInfo.checkPos(clipInfo.java:15) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.update.NPCMovement.getNextNPCMovement(NPCMovemen t.java:57) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.combat.NpcCombat.appendPlayerFollowing(NpcCombat t.java:1913) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.combat.NpcCombat.appendAttackPlayer(NpcCombat.ja a:107) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.NPC.process(NPC.java:471) at net.com.codeusa.Engine.run(Engine.java:255) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Those errors happen when my players attack an npc, and there is no drop or the npc tries to follow them. To keep attacking.
In my engine java my max npc amount is 10000, so not that.
Codeusa base, please help!
This is stopping my server from expanding and being 24/7 please!

item.title: Please help! Will rep
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Fixed over MSN.
Solution:
In clipInfo class

public static byte coords[][][] = new byte[4][4000][4000]

Changed to

public static byte coords[][][] = new byte[4][10001][10001]

In PlayerCombat class
The return value of getRangeDamageDelay() was changed from -1 to 0.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help! Will rep
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

Death, that almost makes sence lol.
But could you maybe explain a bit further or add my msn?
Pritchardthomas@yahoo.com

Read full topic

item.title: Please help! Will rep
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

  1. 9510 is outside of the Array’s index for NPC Movement.
  2. An Arrays index ranges from 0 to x - 1 with x being your defined Array value(Hint -1 cannot be used in an Array)
  3. 5723 is also outside of the Array’s index.

For 1 and 3 look in clipInfo.java on line 15 and see if the Array is defined there, if it is, raise the number inside of it.
Ex.

public static int[] npcMovement = new int[4000];
Just make that 4000 higher than the numbers that gave you errors.

Read full topic
